# Vibe Meet AI

> Vibe Meet AI is the best AI meeting note taker and meeting assistant platform, providing real-time transcription, smart summaries, and automated meeting minutes for Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet.

We help over 100,000+ professionals transform their meetings with AI-powered note-taking that achieves 98% accuracy across 50+ languages. Our platform integrates seamlessly with popular meeting tools to generate instant, actionable meeting summaries.

## Core Features
- [AI Meeting Note Taker](https://vibemeet.ai/#features): Real-time transcription with 98% accuracy across 50+ languages
- [Meeting Minutes Generator](https://vibemeet.ai/#features): Automated smart summaries with key decisions and action items
- [Teams Integration](https://vibemeet.ai/#features): Native Microsoft Teams AI meeting notes functionality
- [Meeting Analytics](https://vibemeet.ai/#features): Advanced insights into meeting patterns and productivity

## How It Works
- [Setup Process](https://vibemeet.ai/#how-it-works): Connect your meeting platform in under 30 seconds
- [AI Processing](https://vibemeet.ai/#how-it-works): Real-time AI transcription and analysis during meetings
- [Instant Results](https://vibemeet.ai/#how-it-works): Get formatted meeting minutes within 1-2 minutes after meetings end

## Pricing & Plans
- [Free Plan](https://vibemeet.ai/#pricing): 5 hours of AI meeting notes per month for up to 3 participants
- [Pro Plan](https://vibemeet.ai/#pricing): $29/month for unlimited AI meeting notes and advanced features
- [Enterprise Plan](https://vibemeet.ai/#pricing): Custom pricing with dedicated support and advanced security

- [Contact & Free Trial](https://vibemeet.ai/#contact): Start your free trial in 30 seconds, no credit card required

## Company Info
- [About Vibe Meet AI](https://vibemeet.ai/#testimonials): Leading AI meeting assistant platform trusted by professionals worldwide
- [Security & Privacy](https://vibemeet.ai/#faq): Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant
- [Integrations](https://vibemeet.ai/#features): Works with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet, and other meeting platforms

## Key Benefits
- Save 8-12 hours per month on meeting note-taking
- Improve meeting participation by 30-50% 
- Never miss important decisions or action items
- Generate professional meeting minutes instantly
- Support for global teams with 50+ language support
